archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Authorize Credit
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Assess a customer's credit worthiness in support of managing customer risk and company exposure to bad debt

properties.value: The purpose of the Authorize Credit processes is to assess a customerâ€™s credit worthiness in support of managing customer risk and company exposure to bad debt. This process is responsible for initiating customer credit checks and for authorizing credit and credit terms in accordance with established enterprise risk and policy guidelines
